php.LBL_YETIFORCE_STATUS_FULL_DESC: Der Statusmechanismus überwacht die Arbeit des CRM-Systems und überträgt ausgewählte Informationen an YetiForce Sp. z o.o. Alle gesammelten Informationen werden nicht veröffentlicht und dienen nur dazu, das CRM-System auf Fehlbedienung und die Umgebung, in der es installiert ist, zu überwachen.
php.LBL_REGISTRATION_OFFLINE_DESC: Um eine Version des Systems zu registrieren, die keinen Zugriff auf das Internet hat, senden Sie eine E-Mail an %s mit den folgenden Daten
php.LBL_REGISTRATION_OFFLINE_EXAMPLE:
Betrifft: YetiForce Offline Registrierung

Nachricht:
CRM Registrierung:
Der Name Ihres Unternehmens:
Land:
Stadt:
Die Anzahl der Mitarbeiter des Unternehmens:
Ihre Firmenwebsite:
Produktschlüssel: %s 
Instanz-ID: %s
php.LBL_SUCCESSFUL_TRANSACTION: Vielen Dank für die Zahlung. Die Transaktion wird verarbeitet, gekaufte Funktionen werden nach Erhalt der Zahlung zu Ihrem System hinzugefügt.
php.LBL_FAILED_TRANSACTION: Transaktion fehlgeschlagen oder storniert, bitte überprüfen Sie die Zahlung auf Ihrem PayPal-Konto und versuchen Sie es erneut.
php.LBL_SIZE_OF_YOUR_COMPANY_HAS_CHANGED: Die Größe Ihres Unternehmens hat sich geändert, das gekaufte Paket ist zu klein für die aktuelle Größe. Aktualisieren Sie Ihr Abonnement.
php.LBL_SHOP_INVOICE_DETAILS_DESC: Die Änderung der eingegebenen Daten löst eine Datenaktualisierung im System aus
php.LBL_SHOP_NO_COMPANIES_ALERT: Es gibt keine Daten des Zielbenutzers (das Unternehmen, das das CRM besitzt) im System. Die Daten sind erforderlich, um eine Rechnung zu erstellen, es ist nicht möglich, eine Zahlung ohne diese Daten zu tätigen.

php.LBL_VULNERABILITIES_OK_DESC: Vergessen Sie nicht, die Schwachstellen in Ihren Bibliotheken regelmäßig zu überprüfen.
php.LBL_VULNERABILITIES_WARNING_DESC: Es wurden Sicherheitslücken in Bibliotheken entdeckt, es wird empfohlen, diese schnell zu aktualisieren.
php.LBL_SHOP_DONATIONS_INTRO: Would you like to influence the future of YetiForce? Support its development!
php.LBL_SHOP_DONATIONS_DESC: Would you like to influence the future of YetiForce? Support its development!
php.LBL_SHOP_PREMIUMSUPPORT_INTRO: If you do not know how the system works, or you require individual and quick help, this package is for you
php.LBL_SHOP_PREMIUMSUPPORT_DESC: If you do not know how the system works, or you require individual and quick help, this package is for you
php.LBL_SHOP_DISABLEBRANDING_INTRO: You can now disable the YetiForce footer for a fee.
php.LBL_SHOP_DISABLEBRANDING_DESC: You can now disable the YetiForce footer for a fee.
php.LBL_SHOP_INTEGRATOR_INTRO: Offer the YetiForce system to your clients and gain exclusive perks available only to YetiForce Integrator partners.
php.LBL_SHOP_INTEGRATOR_DESC:
REQUIREMENTS 

 1. Correct registration of all YetiForce installations used by the Partner and the Partner’s clients. 
 2. Owning a GitHub account and active participation in the YetiForce repository. 

 BENEFITS 

 1. Direct support (chat, e-mail, GitHub) from the YetiForce team in terms of advanced problems related to system operation, API and configuration. Support can be provided in Polish or English. Support may also be provided to the Partner’s customers in cases when the Partner will not be able to help its customers. 
 2. The possibility of hiring YetiForce’s employees for large implementations (service available for an additional charge, provided remotely, communication in Polish and English). 
 3. The opportunity to cooperate in tenders (shared customer testimonials, a common list of specialists, support in price estimates). 
 4. Ability to use the “YetiForce Integrator” logo on the Internet. 
 5. Promotion in the partnership catalog on the official website and in the YetiForce system. 
 6. 10% discount on all products offered in the marketplace by the YetiForce producer and other Partners (also for Partner’s own customers). The possibility of booking a project - the discount might be 20% but it will be granted to a Partner which books the project as first. 
 7. The impact on the direction of system development and new functionalities. 

  COST 

 1. The monthly participation fee for the YetiForce Integrator partnership is 250 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_INFORMATION: The prices of the products and services below vary depending on the size of the company. The size of the company is determined by the number of system users. The application will automatically adjust the prices to the size of the company each month, according to the following criteria: Micro company (up to 10 users), Small company (up to 50 users), Medium company (up to 250 users), Large company (over 250 users).
php.LBL_SHOP_RESELLER_INTRO: Sell YetiForce’s products and services, earn money on promoting YetiForce in your country.
php.LBL_SHOP_RESELLER_DESC:
REQUIREMENTS 

 1. Providing initial support for customers who were offered YetiForce’s products and services. 
  2. Owning a GitHub account and active participation in the YetiForce repository. 
  3. Correct registration of all YetiForce installations used by the Partner and the Partner’s clients. 

 BENEFITS 

 1. Direct support (chat, e-mail, GitHub) from the YetiForce team in terms of solving simple problems related to the operation and configuration of the system. Support can be provided in Polish or English. 
 2. Ability to use the “YetiForce Reseller” logo on the Internet. 
 3. Promotion in the partnership catalog on the official website and in the YetiForce system. 
 4. 10% discount on all services and products offered by YetiForce (also for reseller’s customers). 
 5. An impact on the direction of system development and new functionalities. 

  COST 

 1. The monthly participation fee for the YetiForce Reseller partnership is 100 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_MODULEPRODUCER_INTRO: Offer your modules and functionalities to YetiForce’s community all over the world in the official store.
php.LBL_SHOP_MODULEPRODUCER_DESC:
REQUIREMENTS 

 1. Creating modules that comply with current technology standards as well as with the system’s architecture. 
  2. Owning a GitHub account and active participation in the YetiForce repository. 
  3. A Partner has to update their modules and provide support on GitHub on a regular basis. 
 4. Correct registration of all YetiForce installations used by the Partner and the Partner’s clients. 

 BENEFITS 

 1. Direct support (chat, e-mail, GitHub) from the YetiForce team in terms of solving simple problems related to operation and configuration of the system. Support can be provided in Polish or English. 
 2. Ability to use the “YetiForce Module Producer” logo on the Internet. 
 3. Promotion in the partnership catalog on the official website and in the YetiForce system. 
 4. 10% discount on all products offered in the marketplace by the YetiForce producer and other Partners (also for Partner’s own customers). 
 5. An impact on the direction of system development and new functionalities. 
 6. Audits of quality and compliance with standards for Partner’s modules. 
 7. Security audits for Partner’s modules. 

  COST 

 1. The monthly participation fee for the YetiForce Module Producer partnership is 100 €.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEGEOCODER_INTRO: Quick and easy search for any address in the world without entering it manually.
php.LBL_SHOP_YETIFORCEGEOCODER_DESC: YetiForce address finder is based on Open Street Maps with a complete world map and no connection limits. In addition, an expensive server is not required for its proper operation.
